mapper.select: select id, title from news where addrflage = 1 and viewFlag = 1
select id, title from news where addrflage = 0 and viewFlag = 1 and sortId = (select id from newSort where name = '户外资讯') limit 1
select id, title from news where addrflage = 0 and viewFlag = 1 and sortId = (select id from newSort where name = '户外资讯') order by id desc limit 10

select id, title from news where addrflage = 0 and viewFlag = 1 and id << (select max(id) from news where sortId = (select id from newSort where name = '社交资讯')) and sortId = (select id from newSort where name = '社交资讯') order by id desc limit 10
